title: The construction of urban cultural and creative industries using deep learning and information management
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Zijian Zhao, Javier Garcia-Campayo, Jin Liang, Ruihui Pu, Hector Monzales Perez, Xi Xue, Luis Borao, Huaqiang Li, Argel Bondoc Masanda, Jing Chen, Lucila Matias Portugal, Jonathan Bulahan Aganan
